item.title: Live music to look forward to this term
item.description: There are lots of opportunities to enjoy live music on campus and beyond with NTU Arts over the next few weeks.

item.title: Don't miss the NTU Spring Careers Fair!
item.description: Visit the Spring Careers Fair on Tuesday 3 March, 11 am–3 pm in the Newton building, City Campus, to explore graduate roles, part‑time jobs, placements and summer opportunities with top employers.

item.title: Help keep NTU’s bike cages safe for everyone
item.description: Find out how you can help to keep the bike cages across our campuses secure for all and learn more about the free Dr Bike sessions happening in March.

item.title: Some of our online services unavailable from Monday 23 February until Tuesday 24 February
item.description: Due to essential maintenance, there will be a scheduled break in some of our online services from 5pm on Monday 23 February until 8am on Tuesday 24 February.

item.title: Fancy a Term Two treat? Win £100 in our WhatsApp prize draw!
item.description: It's February, which means it's cold, it's raining and we know you could do with boosting your mood – and your bank account.

item.title: Honouring the month of Ramadan at NTU
item.description: Share a meal with the NTU community as part of the Iftar, hosted by NTU Faith and supported by our Islamic Society, on Wednesday 4 March.

item.title: Become part of the Content Collective
item.description: Have an eye for the latest TikTok trends? Comfortable on camera? Love creating and editing content? Want to get paid for it? If that sounds like you, we’d love to hear from you.

item.title: Save money on your postgraduate course with a scholarship
item.description: If you’re considering staying on at NTU for postgraduate study, there’s good news—funding support is more accessible than you might think.

item.title: Entries now open for the 2026 NTU Arts Creative Competition
item.description: Inspired by the book Queer as Folklore by Featured Writer Sacha Coward, NTU Arts is asking students to submit writing, music or images representing monsters, myths and magic.

item.title: Some of our online services will be unavailable on Thursday 12 February
item.description: Due to essential maintenance, there will be a scheduled break in some of our online services on Thursday 12 February between 6.30 am–9.30 am.
